ghost

Class Movable

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameObject
      • ghost.Movable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, Waka

    public abstract class Movable
extends GameObject
    An abstract class that all movable objects extend from. Contains properties about their collision borders, direction of travel and speed. Has methods that are used to determine collisions with walls, as all movable objects are bounded by walls.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Movable.Direction
      enum containing all the possible directions that a movable object could be travelling in.

      • setCollisionBorders

        public abstract void setCollisionBorders()
        Uses the pixel coordinates to draw a collision border around the object.

      • move

        public void move()
        Takes into account a players direction, and changes their x and y velocity to make them move in a particular direction. Changes their x and y velocity using their speed which is read in the config file.

      • wallOnRight

        public boolean wallOnRight()
        Check for a wall on players right
        Returns:
